name: gitLAB Midnight Mariner
description:
Gitlab theme for self hosted installs as well.

UPDATE:

added a custom domain option for self hosted installs of gitlab // defaults to domain("gitlab.com") under the Avanced Style Settings now with extra less crufty padding! ALSO styles new sidebar/navbar :P
additional_info:
09/18/17:
Update colors to be more uniform

09/06/2-17:
Change primary background to greyer over blacker

08/30/2017:
update sticky headers in long diffs/merges

08/24/2017:
update user type identifier in `.note-line`

08/17/17:
alter font smoothing 

08/16/17:
add some right sidebar color links and modify background color for buttons on merge request/discussion block headers

08/11/17:
- added some tweaks to inner header tab coloring
- added a custom domain option for self hosted installs of gitlab // defaults to domain("gitlab.com")
- update target/source branch colors in merge request requests
- updates colors for merge request page

discussions.name: Lots of garish washed out sections, and invisible text
